column8: JASON FRANCIS S. ABADEJOS  Certified ANSCARIAN, EL MARGARITA, and part of MEDSCI UNO! I-9 and II-4 for 2nd year, III-1 for 3rd year, and finally IV-1 for my last year.  Currently a LASALLIAN! :D  I like fried chicken, especially KFC <3  Likes studying, listening to music and making music charts. =)  My favorite show is 2 Days 1 Night (1?2?)!  I like cooking shows especially the ones hosted by Chef Gordon Ramsay because he always cusses at people. :D  That's all for now.
